other_tests.findings: Decreased fT4 serum levels of 0.20 ng/dl and fT3 of 0.072 ng/dl, low serum TSH concentration of 0.23 U/ml.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After treatment with thyroid hormone replacement, patient remained euthyroid.

other_tests.findings: Inadequate increase of the TSH concentration (maximum TSH concentration of 0.35 U/ml after 45 min).
GH increase was weak, from 6.4 ng/ml at 0 min to maximum GH concentration of 8.9 ng/ml at 45 min.

other_tests.procedure_name: TSH testing using two monoclonal antibodies
other_tests.findings: TSH detected in serum at low concentrations (0.047 and 0.043 U/ml).
Common haplotype shared among all affected individuals indicating a founder mutation.
